mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM ( select @RNUM := @RNUM +1 AS RNUM, t.* from ( select * from bardciel.media order by lyricsNo desc ) t, (select @RNUM := 0) R ) a WHERE a.RNUM >= #{startRow} AND a.RNUM <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert:
SELECT ifnull(MAX(lyricsNo), 0)+1 as lyricsNo FROM bardciel.media
INSERT INTO bardciel.media(lyricsNo, title, singer, url, bpm, playCnt, recCnt, lyrics, happy, sad, disgust, interest, pain, fear, rage) VALUES(#{lyricsNo}, #{title}, #{singer}, #{url}, #{bpm}, #{playCnt}, #{recCnt},#{lyrics},#{happy},#{sad},#{disgust},#{interest},#{pain},#{fear},#{rage})
mapper.update: UPDATE bardciel.media SET title = #{title}, singer = #{singer}, url = #{url}, bpm = #{bpm}, playCnt = #{playCnt}, recCnt = #{recCnt}, lyrics = #{lyrics}, happy = #{happy}, sad = #{sad}, disgust = #{disgust}, interest = #{interest}, pain = #{pain}, fear = #{fear}, rage = #{rage} WHERE lyricsNo = #{lyricsNo}
UPDATE bardciel.media SET playCnt = playCnt + 1 WHERE lyricsNo = #{lyricsNo}
UPDATE bardciel.media SET recCnt = recCnt + 1 WHERE lyricsNo = #{lyricsNo}
